meanings.definition: Stingy or miserly in spending or using resources.
meanings.sent1: The niggarded man refused to buy even the cheapest items.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her niggarded ways when it came to buying gifts.
meanings.sent3: The niggarded squirrel hoarded all the nuts for itself.
meanings.sent4: His niggarded attitude towards charity left many in need.
meanings.sent5: The niggarded old man counted every penny in his pocket.

meanings.sent1: The niggarded child didn't want to share his toys with anyone.
meanings.sent2: She was niggarded with her compliments, rarely praising others.
meanings.sent3: The niggarded cat refused to let anyone pet it.
meanings.sent4: His niggarded nature made it hard for him to form close friendships.
meanings.sent5: The niggarded student kept all the answers to himself during the group project.
